abstract: Capital punishment proponents in Nebraska, where death penalty was repealed  in May, are launching effort to keep law from taking effect and to force statewide vote on whether punishment should be reinstated; effort is largely funded by Republican Gov Pete Ricketts and his billionaire father Joe Ricketts.
lead_paragraph: The State Legislature voted resoundingly to end capital punishment and overrode Gov. Pete Ricketts’s veto. Proponents of the death penalty, with funding from Governor Ricketts and his father, are fighting back.

headline.main: Nebraska Petition Drive Threatens to Undo Death Penalty Repeal
headline.print_headline: Petition Drive Threatens to Undo Nebraska Legislature’s Death Penalty Repeal

snippet: The State Legislature voted resoundingly to end capital punishment and overrode Gov. Pete Ricketts’s veto. Proponents of the death penalty, with funding from Governor Ricketts and his father, are fighting back.
